page.title: 06A Roof Over Our Heads
page.content: During the past ten years,{Banchory ,a small eighteen miles west of Aberdeen,has increased dramatically. What was once a quiet, peacful, little community with a population of less than two thousand has suddenly exploded into a busy,bustling place with over seven thousand inhabitants. Originally our town catered for visitors,and provided an ideal retirement haven,but now many homes are required for the vast number of families who have come to live in this part of the world. We have many house types in our town ranging from a "but and ben,"to four or five bedroomed residences.While some houses have been here since the middle of the nineteenth century others are only a few years old and in fact many are at this moment in time under construction.
